channel.title: Changing item names makes every item unequippable?
channel.description: Hi, I just used Tom's Cache Suite to change the names of some items. However when I did that, (the item was a steel platebody), I could not equip the item, or any item in that case. Anyone know if this is just a simple issue?

item.title: Changing item names makes every item unequippable?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

How do I give the items the same model, traits and such as the model I edited before

Read full topic
item.source: Changing item names makes every item unequippable?

item.title: Changing item names makes every item unequippable?
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

Docent:

Hi, I just used Tom’s Cache Suite to change the names of some items. However when I did that, (the item was a steel platebody), I could not equip the item, or any item in that case. Anyone know if this is just a simple issue?

Be careful in tom’s suite, modifying itemdefinitions commonly goes WRONG.
Add more items on the end and make the item there.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing item names makes every item unequippable?
